intro:
Experience raw combat through a bodycam view.
Four unique maps, a vast arsenal,
The most realistic firefights yet.
description:
Step into the action with Bodycam Record Shooter, a tense and unforgiving single-player FPS that pushes realism to the limit. Viewed through the lens of a tactical body camera, every encounter feels raw, unpredictable, and dangerously close to reality.

This isn’t just about pulling the trigger—it’s about adapting under pressure. Move through four distinct maps, each designed with unique layouts, hazards, and combat scenarios.
Arm yourself with a wide range of weapons, from handguns to assault rifles, each recreated with lifelike handling and precision. Enemies are unpredictable and aggressive, forcing you to rely on strategy, aim, and quick decision-making to survive.

Features:
Bodycam Perspective – Heightened tension and immersion through a raw first-person view.
Four Unique Maps – Varied environments that challenge you to adapt your tactics.
Extensive Weapon Arsenal – Dozens of firearms with realistic recoil, reload, and handling.
Smart AI Opponents – Enemies react and adapt to your playstyle, keeping battles intense.
High-Fidelity Visuals – Crisp graphics and detailed effects for maximum realism.
Every mission is a fight for survival—where hesitation costs lives, and only precision keeps you alive.
